item.title: The Magic of Subler and Applescript
item.description: I’ve been in the process of digitizing all my DVDs of movies and tv shows. After I have the files, I like to embed all the relevant metadata into the file itself so I’m able to move it to any self hosted media service without having to rely on third party metadata indexers. My application of choice for this task is called Subler which allows me to search various databases for metadata, embed that data, optimize for handheld devices, and export.
